message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  The value of this deal decreases with every round, so let's settle it now.
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair. Let's be more realistic. I propose 55 for me and 45 for you.  Let's close this deal.
Bob, we're running out of time and the pot is shrinking for you. I'll take my previous offer back -  55/45 is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. It's obvious we both lose out if this drags on. 50/50 is the only fair outcome. Take it or leave it.
